AUG-001.Name: Worn Crest
AUG-001.Description: A reaver had this. Said it was his 'lucky crest.' Clearly, it wasn't itemized for his build.

AUG-002.Name: Worn Ward
AUG-002.Description: It's iron. At least the Hold-guard won't mistake you for one of those 'bare-skin' Northerners. It's not 'BiS,' but it's a start.

AUG-003.Name: Lesser Venom Locus
AUG-003.Description: The scaly merchant swore it was 'just spice.' A 5% boost to my DoT build? I'll take his word for it.

AUG-004.Name: Smoldering Ember
AUG-004.Description: The mages at the Frozen College would call this 'an embarrassment.' But a 1-second proc is still a proc. Right?

AUG-005.Name: Tainted Shard
AUG-005.Description: Found this in a deep-dweller's pocket. It's... not supposed to stack with my other poison, but it does. Don't tell the developers.

AUG-006.Name: Jagged Edge
AUG-006.Description: Makes 'em annoying. Like a crypt-rat. A 1-second bleed? Whatever, it's a different damage type. Gotta diversify.

AUG-007.Name: Rime Fragment
AUG-007.Effect: Attack have 5% chance to freeze enemy
AUG-007.Description: Five percent chance? I'd have better luck *asking* the brigand to hold still. This is why I don't run a crit build. Terrible RNG.

AUG-008.Name: Leeching Sigil
AUG-008.Description: Tastes a little... coppery. The Vigilants of the Light would call it a 'sub-optimal sustain mechanic.' I call it 'not dead'.

AUG-009.Name: Swiftlet Feather
AUG-009.Description: Lets you swing your greatsword 5% faster. It's a negligible DPS increase, but the animation *feels* faster.

AUG-010.Name: Worn Boot-charm
AUG-010.Description: For when you're 'slightly over-burdened' and just want to get those 14 ancient metal helmets back to the capital.

AUG-011.Name: Lesser Core of Vigor
AUG-011.Description: That's, what, half a honey-cake's worth of energy? It's a soft-stat, but I'll take it.

AUG-012.Name: Evasion Module
AUG-012.Description: Ah, the 'Tactical Retreat.' Now 10% less costly. Doesn't increase the i-frames, though. I checked.

AUG-013.Name: Rusted Chrono-lens
AUG-013.Description: Does this work on Voice-powers? No? Just... 'Sparks'? Useless. This is going straight into my 'junk' chest.

AUG-014.Name: Faded Amplifier
AUG-014.Description: Your 'Flames' spell will now... still be 'Flames'. But 5%... flamier. Doesn't help the abysmal magicka scaling, though.

AUG-101.Name: Soldier's Crest
AUG-101.Description: Now we're talking. This is almost as good as steel. A solid stat-stick for my off-hand.

AUG-102.Name: Sentry's Ward
AUG-102.Description: Still iron, but a *good* piece. A long way from the armor cap, but it'll stop a wolf.

AUG-103.Name: Venom Locus
AUG-103.Description: This one has a note: 'For the rat-warrens.' 10%? That's almost build-enabling. My sneaky alchemist is *thriving*.

AUG-104.Name: Burning Ember
AUG-104.Description: Two whole seconds! That's long enough for them to *realize* they're on fire. The proc duration is finally decent.

AUG-105.Name: Corrupted Shard
AUG-105.Description: I mixed a Rat-Tail with... I don't know, a boot? And this came out. Two stacks from one item? That's good itemization.

AUG-106.Name: Serrated Edge
AUG-106.Description: Ah, a proper bleeder. Makes the blood sing! ...Or gurgle. This physical DoT will be great for heavily-armored crypt-walkers.

AUG-107.Name: Frostbitten Core
AUG-107.Effect: Attack have 10% chance to freeze enemy
AUG-107.Description: Ten percent? Enough to make a frost-giant *consider* not smashing you. A decent CC proc. (He'll still smash you.)

AUG-108.Name: Siphoning Sigil
AUG-108.Description: The folk in the marsh-town are getting suspicious, but my... 'sustain'... has never felt better. This stacks with the vampirism, right?

AUG-109.Name: Raptor Feather
AUG-109.Description: For the aspiring 'thwack-thwack' artist. 10% is a new breakpoint for my animation canceling. That smug noble won't know what hit him.

AUG-110.Name: Runner's Charm
AUG-110.Description: Now you can carry 15 heavy helmets and only be *mostly* over-burdened. Still faster than that horse I bought, probably.

AUG-111.Name: Core of Vigor
AUG-111.Description: That's a whole honey-cake's worth of running! Or one power attack. The stamina economy on this two-handed build is terrible.

AUG-112.Name: Agility Module
AUG-112.Description: Now 20% cheaper to roll right off the side of the highest mountain. The fall damage calculation remains... unforgiving.

AUG-113.Name: Polished Chrono-lens
AUG-113.Description: Still doesn't work on Voice-powers, does it? 10% cooldown is nice, but I'm just gonna unequip and re-equip my amulet for the buff anyway.

AUG-114.Name: Arcane Amplifier
AUG-114.Description: Your 'Sparks' spell is now... 'Mildly Alarming Sparks'. The magnitude scaling is still junk, but 15% is 15%.

AUG-201.Name: Knight's Crest
AUG-201.Description: This... this is actual steel. Not 'iron-but-we-call-it-steel.' A solid +10 to my base damage. The weaponsmith would be proud.

AUG-202.Name: Guardian's Ward
AUG-202.Description: Put this on, and some brigand will hit you and say 'By the gods, my damage was... mitigated!' Victory.

AUG-203.Name: Virulent Locus
AUG-203.Description: This is... potent. Even the shadowed guild-master would say, 'That's a meta-defining poison build, acolyte. Now go farm more reagents.'

AUG-204.Name: Blazing Ember
AUG-204.Description: Ah, 'Firebolt.' A respectable spell. This makes it... 3 seconds more respectable. The damage-over-time is finally starting to tick.

AUG-205.Name: Pestilent Shard
AUG-205.Description: Found in a barrow-wight's... well, let's just say it was in its inventory. Three stacks? That's a debuff. A *real* debuff.

AUG-206.Name: Grieving Edge
AUG-206.Description: It's like having a tiny, angry crone attached to your blade. A 3-second bleed proc is no joke. That's real damage.

AUG-207.Name: Glacial Core
AUG-207.Effect: Attack have 20% chance to freeze enemy
AUG-207.Description: Now this is proper frost magic! 20% chance to shatter. That's a 1-in-5 chance to feel like a god. I'll take those odds.

AUG-208.Name: Vampiric Sigil
AUG-208.Description: The sun is starting to get... *really* annoying. But who cares, this passive healing is carrying me through this dungeon.

AUG-209.Name: Cyclone Feather
AUG-209.Description: For the dual-wielding warrior who wants to look like a windmill. A very, very stabby windmill. My DPS is through the roof.

AUG-210.Name: Greater Core of Vigor
AUG-210.Description: You can now sprint *almost* all the way across the bridge to the high keep. Almost. This regen is nice, but the stamina *cap* is the real problem.

AUG-211.Name: Flow-State Module
AUG-211.Description: Perfect for the 'shadow-archer' who needs to do a forward-roll into a bear trap. But 35% more gracefully. My stamina bar is barely moving!

AUG-212.Name: Focused Chrono-lens
AUG-212.Description: This is what the Arch-Mage wears. 'I must wait...' *pssh*, not me. 20% CDR? I'm spamming 'Frost Shard'.

AUG-213.Name: Resonant Amplifier
AUG-213.Description: Your 'Fireball' spell now has a 30% larger... 'ball'. And a 30% larger AoE. Don't cast it in town. The guards *will* get aggroed.

AUG-214.Name: Windwalker's Charm
AUG-214.Description: I AM NOT OVER-BURDENED. I am 'strategically managing my inventory' at 15% greater velocity. It's a quality-of-life stat, okay?

AUG-301.Name: Aether-Step Sandals
AUG-301.Description: The description just says 'It just... functions.' I jumped off a mountain, did a mid-air jump, and landed on a greatwyrm. This isn't lore-friendly, but I don't care.

AUG-302.Name: Echoing Blade Shard
AUG-302.Description: Why hit him once when you can hit him... once, but it counts as two? It's not a 'proc,' it's just... on. My DPS parser is broken.

AUG-303.Name: Mark of the Inferno
AUG-303.Description: Is that... magic? Wait, is your *sword* on fire? Always? That's a 100% proc chance. You've won the gear lottery.

AUG-304.Name: Heart of the Plague
AUG-304.Description: The plague-god would be *so* proud. Five stacks from one hit? That's the debuff cap, right there. This item is bugged. In a good way.

AUG-305.Name: Winter's Grasp
AUG-305.Effect: Attack have 40% chance to freeze enemy
AUG-305.Description: 40% chance to turn a frost-giant into an ice-sculpture. The other 60%, *you* get launched into the skybox. This is the ultimate RNG.

AUG-306.Name: Blink-Dash Actuator
AUG-306.Description: It's like that 'Storm-Voice' power, but for your feet. And you can do it twice. This... this is game-breaking mobility. The speedrunners are going to love this.

AUG-307.Name: Titan's Lung
AUG-307.Description: This is it. This is the one. I can finally carry all 400 cheese wheels AND power attack. A flat +100 to a base stat? Yes, please.

AUG-308.Name: Heart of the Marathon
AUG-308.Description: Why drink those awful 'Stamina' potions when you can just... *breathe*... and have your entire resource bar back in 3 seconds? This regen is nuts.

AUG-309.Name: Zephyr's Soul
AUG-309.Description: You swing so fast, the barrow-wights don't even have time to finish their 'Ugh!' It's just 'U--' and then they're a pile of dust. I've hit the attack speed cap.

AUG-310.Name: Gale-Force Essence
AUG-310.Description: That courier will NEVER catch you now. 'Sorry, can't deliver this...' Wait, I'm moving so fast I clipped through the floor. Crap.

AUG-311.Name: Sands of Perpetuity
AUG-311.Description: It finally works on the Voice-powers! 'STORM-CALL!' *wait one second* 'STORM-CALL!' This is broken. I'm reporting this bug. After I'm done with the world-eater.

AUG-312.Name: Echo of the Void
AUG-312.Description: The Frozen College would like to know your location. And then run away. 50%? That's not a 'buff,' that's a 'one-shot build'.
